title: Kpop Demon Hunters Abby Saja Youtooz Vinyl Figure
body_html:
Gwi-Ma's new scheme to break free from the Honmoon has sent Abby for his Youtooz debut!

Crouched down at 4.1 inches tall, with his hand raising up to the bright yellow eye glistening from his purple face that's covered in jagged demonic markings, short maroon hair sweeps out effortlessly from underneath the wide brim of the hat atop his head. Dressed in black and wearing a red mesh shirt underneath a long, flowing coat, he's accessorized with gloves and grey jewelry along with stylish sneakers.

The exterior of the packaging sees his silhouette with glowing yellow eyes against a pink and purple flaming background, while the interior is filled with a deep purple that's covered in small white dots. The protective sleeve is then a deep pink to purple gradient with thin lines wrapping over its surface as his figure can be seen through the large, clear window at the packaging's front. This collectible ships in a matte, embossed, protective outer sleeve and a custom-sized plastic protector for maximum protection during shipping.

  • Preorder figure is non-refundable
  • Size: Height: 4.1"
